sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Container, Typography, Button, Grid } from '@mui/material';
import { motion } from 'framer-motion';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        minHeight: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        pt: 8,
        pb: 6,
      }}
    >
      <Container maxWidth="lg">
        <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <motion.div
              initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -50 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
              transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
            >
              <Typography
                variant="h2"
                component="h1"
                gutterBottom
                sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}
              >
                Hi, I'm Ritik Ranjan
              </Typography>
              <Typography
                variant="h4"
                color="primary"
                gutterBottom
                sx={{ mb: 4 }}
              >
                Full Stack Developer | AI/ML & Data Analytics Enthusiast
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
                I'm a passionate software developer with expertise in building
                modern web applications. I love creating elegant solutions to
                complex problems and am always eager to learn new technologies.
              </Typography>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2 }}>
                <Button
                  variant="contained"
                  color="primary"
                  size="large"
                  component={RouterLink}
                  to="/projects"
                >
                  View My Work
                </Button>
                <Button
                  variant="outlined"
                  color="primary"
                  size="large"
                  component={RouterLink}
                  to="/contact"
                >
                  Contact Me
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </motion.div>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <motion.div
              initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 50 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
              transition={{ duration: 0.5, delay: 0.2 }}
            >
              <Box
                component="img"
                src="/profile-image.jpg"
                alt="Profile"
                sx={{
                  width: '100%',
                  maxWidth: 500,
                  height: 'auto',
                  borderRadius: 2,
                  boxShadow: 3,
                }}
              />
            </motion.div>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
